info.description:
Given a template name and the placeholder text, this will generate a PDF file, store it in 
 evidence management and will return the URI to retrieve the stored document
info.title: Divorce Document Generation API

post.summary: Generate PDF document based on the supplied template name and placeholder texts and returns the PDF.

parameters.name: allRequestParams
parameters.description: Form data containing the template name and key value pair of placeholder texts

200.description: PDF was generated successfully. Returns the PDF document.

post.summary: Generate PDF document based on the supplied template name and placeholder texts and saves it in the evidence management.

parameters.name: templateData
parameters.description: JSON object containing the templateName and the placeholder text map

200.description: PDF was generated successfully and stored in the evidence management. Returns the url to the stored document.

400.description: Returned when input parameters are invalid or template not found

500.description: Returned when there is an unknown server error

503.description: Returned when the PDF Service or Evidence Management Client Api cannot be reached

GenerateDocumentRequest.description: Request body model for Document Generation Request
